snippet.title: Flap Happy Trailer - A Roguelike Platformer For The NES and Gameboy
snippet.description:
Flap your wings off in the world's first 8-Bit Avian Roguelike Platformer! It’s you versus gravity, sharks, and more as you flap to dodge hazards, collect fruit, and land on platforms. Each stage has its own hazards, and procedural randomization means you’ll always be flapping it in somewhere new!

Learn more: https://bit.ly/MCSFlapHappy 
Support the project on Kickstarter: https://bit.ly/FlapHappy
For more on Mega Cat Studios and our games, please visit: https://megacatstudios.com/
Come play & talk on Discord: https://www.discord.gg/megacat
